cause.description:
The Amani Children's Foundation's mission is building a bridge of partnership between American communities and the children of Africa while raising awareness of the AIDS Orphan Crisis in Africa. The foundation is currently focusing on supporting the work of New Life Home Trust of Kenya by raising money and resources that will sustain and grow their excellent care of abandoned infants.
Go to http://amanichildren.org for more info!
1. Building bridges of understanding and financial support for AIDS orphans.
2. Raise awareness of the 13 million African orphans as a result of HIV/AIDS.
3. Challenging despair with hope, leadership and action.
cause.mission: Raise awareness of the AIDS Orphan Crisis in Africa and to support New Life Home orphanages in Kenya.
